articles.description: Tecno Phantom V Flip 5G is equipped with an interesting set of specifications from the handset's camera to its battery. But what makes the phone unique is its price in India. Other foldable phones available in India include the Motorola Razr 40 series, the Op…
articles.content: Tecno's Phantom V Flip 5G is the company's latest foldable phone to debut in India this handset has arrived in the country ahead of other markets. The smartphone is equipped with an interesting set o… [+3663 chars]
